album.title: Bucksense Mobile
album.description: The project was to develop the frontend of an app version of the app called Bucksense. I've used MobileAngularUI, AngularJS, RestAngular and Chart.js to accomplish the required objectives.

album.title: SkillSweet
album.description: I've maintained the SkillSweet for almost 3 years, upgrading and optimizing it. I've developed the mobile version too.

album.title: Inventário Turístico
album.description: The website had to be built in 1 week. For this I've used 960.gs grid system to make it responsive on an easy and fast way. Used jQuery and LESS for plugins and speed too.

album.title: Instituto IDEIAS
album.description: The main website of the company, had to be fully responsive, I've used 960.gs and LESS. For the carousels and other interface apps I've used jQuery with some plugins.

album.title: Destino Petrópolis
album.description: Templated developed for the city of Petrópolis, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. For easy of maintainance I've used jQuery, LESS and 960.gs grid system.

album.title: Visite São Pedro da Aldeia
album.description: Templated developed for the city of São Pedro da Aldeia, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. For easy of maintainance I've used jQuery, LESS and 960.gs grid system.
